translation.fr: et de la façon dont on la traite.

translation.en: And who are these concerned parties? I'm not at liberty to reveal that information.
translation.fr: - Qui sont ces gens ? - Je ne suis pas libre de le révéler.

translation.en: They're friends of Ms. Peterson who wish to remain anonymous.
translation.fr: Des amis à elle souhaitant garder l'anonymat.

translation.en: Sir, we're going around in circles.
Either you show me some paperwork that proves
translation.fr: Soit vous me montrez une preuve

translation.en: you are Ms. Peterson's lawyer,
or you bring these concerned parties
translation.fr: soit vous convoquez ces parties concernées

translation.en: into a hearing and let them speak for themselves.
translation.fr: pour qu'elles s'expriment lors d'une audience.

translation.en: But for now, Mr. Ericson,
translation.fr: Mais pour le moment, M. Ericson,

translation.en: your request to dissolve this guardianship is denied.
translation.fr: votre demande de mainlevée de la tutelle est refusée.

translation.en: Sir, sir, sir.
Look-- Whoa!
Okay! It's family court.
translation.fr: C'est un tribunal des affaires familiales.

translation.en: Okay? And the judge is an asshole!
translation.fr: Et le juge est un connard !

translation.en: He's an idiot! He doesn't even know law. Okay? He drives a fucking Subaru!
translation.fr: Il n'y connaît rien en droit. Il conduit une Subaru !

translation.en: Stop talking!
Stop!
Fuck this.
Good morning.
Good morning. My name is Walter Smith.
These are my brothers, Tony and Chad.
translation.fr: Voici mes frères, Tony et Chad.

translation.en: I spoke to your manager,
Mr. Rice, this morning about a tour of the facility.
translation.fr: M. Rice, ce matin, au sujet d'une visite de l'EHPAD.

translation.en: Great. I'll get him on the phone for you. Thank you.
- Mr. Smith? - Mr. Smith.
She's dead.
Who?
Jennifer Peterson's dead.
What?
When?
When she was three months and nine days, from polio.
translation.fr: À trois mois et neuf jours, de la polio.

translation.en: The woman we have, Marla, isn't Jennifer Peterson.
translation.fr: Cette femme n'est pas Jennifer Peterson.

translation.en: She just stole the identity of a dead child.
translation.fr: Elle a volé l'identité d'une enfant décédée.

translation.en: You can see, we're--
And look at this.
I found an obituary of the dead girl in an old newspaper.
translation.fr: La nécrologie de l'enfant dans un vieux journal.

translation.en: And of course, we have
superb medical staff and facilities on- site.
translation.fr: d'un personnel et d'équipements médicaux de pointe.

translation.en: So, any questions?
Actually, yes.
My father has a friend who's a resident here,
translation.fr: Mon père a une amie qui réside ici,

translation.en: and we'd love if we could say a quick hello.
translation.fr: et on aimerait lui dire bonjour.

translation.en: - It'd mean a lot. - Of course. What is the name?
translation.fr: - C'est capital. - Bien sûr. Son nom ?

translation.en: Is there a problem?
Jennifer's been unwell. She's resting.
translation.fr: Elle se sent mal et se repose.

translation.en: Oh, we'll be very quick. We promised our father. You understand.
translation.fr: On fera vite. On a promis à notre père. Vous comprenez.

translation.en: Of course. The thing is, Jennifer's guardian has stipulated
translation.fr: Bien sûr, mais selon sa tutrice,

translation.en: that she have only approved visitors.
translation.fr: elle ne doit voir que des visiteurs approuvés.

translation.en: That's odd. She sounds, uh, a bit more like a prisoner than a guest.
translation.fr: C'est bizarre. On dirait plus une prisonnière qu'une résidente.

translation.en: Um, tell you what. Why don't I try and get, Jennifer's guardian on the phone
translation.fr: Je vais essayer de joindre la tutrice de Jennifer

translation.en: and see what I can do?
Of course.
Hey! Hey! What'd you do to him?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que vous lui avez fait ?

translation.en: - Ah, shit. - Somebody help Mr. Rice!
Find her! Go!
- Help! - Jerry!
Oh shit.
Lock it down. Lock it down!
Then who do we have?
I don't know, but this stolen identity is incredibly sophisticated.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas, mais ce vol d'identité est très sophistiqué.

translation.en: We're talking about passports, driver's license, employment,
translation.fr: Passeports, permis de conduire, contrats de travail,

translation.en: tax records going back 40 years.
I mean, they've scrubbed all trace of the real Jennifer Peterson,
translation.fr: Ils ont effacé toute trace de la vraie Jennifer Peterson,

translation.en: including her death certificate.
translation.fr: y compris son acte de décès.

translation.en: Marla Grayson. Yeah.
Fuck.
I'm on my way.
Madam!
Madam?
Thank you.
Madam!
Get down on the ground!
Madam?
Hello?
Out of the way!
Get out of the way!
About fucking time!
- Open the door. - You don't wanna do this.
Open it!
Listen to me.
I am prepared to kill you to get out of here.
translation.fr: Je suis prêt à vous buter pour sortir.

translation.en: Are you prepared to die to stop me? Huh?
I didn't think so.
- - Thank you.
Right this way, ma'am.
- Get the fuck off of me! - That way!
Fuck you!
- We got you. - No! No, you don't!
Yeah, vacation is over.
Let's go.
Weapons cold! Weapons cold! Hands out! Go around the back!
translation.fr: - Ne tirez pas ! - Les mains en l'air ! Faites le tour !

translation.en: What is your name?
Why'd you want to kidnap that little old lady?
translation.fr: Pourquoi vouloir enlever la vieille dame ?

translation.en: Wanna make your phone call?
Want a doughnut?
He doesn't know it yet, but we found him in our system. He's done time before.
translation.fr: Il l'ignore, mais on l'a identifié. Il a fait de la prison.

translation.en: Who is he?
Brother of Nicholas Ignatyev,
who was once a brigadier in the Cleveland Russian Mafia.
translation.fr: qui était brigadier de la mafia russe de Cleveland.

translation.en: Was?
Nicholas died seven years ago in a fire along with his boss Roman Lunyov.
translation.fr: Mort il y a sept ans dans un incendie avec son boss, Roman Lunyov.

translation.en: It was arson. A hit. They'd been caught skimming.
translation.fr: C'était un meurtre. Un règlement de comptes.

translation.en: These assholes were drug smugglers and implicated in a bunch of murders.
translation.fr: C'étaient des narcotrafiquants impliqués dans un tas de meurtres.

translation.en: We thought Alexi died in the fire too,
but here he is, trying to kidnap your ward.
translation.fr: mais il est là, à essayer d'enlever votre protégée.

translation.en: Who is she, anyway, your ward? Nobody, she's a retired businesswoman.
translation.fr: - Qui est-elle ? - Une femme d'affaires à la retraite.

translation.en: Rich?
So- so.
Well, maybe it was just a stick- up job.
translation.fr: Une banale tentative de vol, alors.

translation.en: You guys did good today, stopping them. This guy's a bad dude.
translation.fr: Bon boulot. C'est un vrai malfrat.

translation.en: - Do me a favor? - Hmm?
Keep us in the loop if you hear anything else.
translation.fr: Dis-nous si tu as autre chose.

translation.en: Sure thing, Frankie.
- Lou. - Huh?
Don't call me Frankie.
You used to like being called Frankie.
Yeah, not anymore.
Frankie?
- It used to be a thing for a second. - I like it.
translation.fr: - Un truc entre nous. - J'aime bien.

translation.en: - Frankie. - No.
Yeah, it's me.
I need something.
Oh, hello.
Sorry. I'm just closing up. Did you have an appointment?
translation.fr: Désolée. Je ferme. Vous aviez rendez-vous ?

translation.en: Fran?
Marla?
You heard about Karen? Yeah. Oh my God, baby.
translation.fr: - Tu sais pour Karen ? - Oui. Mon Dieu, bébé.

translation.en: Okay, pack a bag.
We gotta go. If they killed her, we're next.
translation.fr: S'ils l'ont tuée, ils vont venir.

translation.en: We don't know they killed her.
Karen may have had trouble we didn't know about.
Oh really? Do you believe that?
Okay, then.
Marla, I don't want you to get shot in the head,
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas qu'on nous retrouve

translation.en: and I don't wanna get shot either.
So we don't get shot in the head.
Marla, we went after Jennifer Peterson because she was a cherry.
translation.fr: On a ciblé Mme Peterson parce que c'était une perle.

translation.en: A cherry with no strings attached, baby, but she, she's a spider web.
translation.fr: Une perle sans attaches, mais c'est une toile d'araignée.

translation.en: - And we're gonna get trapped in it. - Well, maybe, but maybe not.
translation.fr: - On va se faire prendre dedans. - Pas forcément.

translation.en: They brought guns into a care home. They're the Russian mafia, Marla.
translation.fr: Ils sont entrés armés dans un EHPAD. C'est la mafia russe.

translation.en: - Ex- Russian mafia. - Marla, pack a fucking bag.
Fuck.
Curtis, it's Marla.
Yeah, we saw.
I know. I know.
Yeah, you should close the office. Hang tight for a while. Okay?
translation.fr: Oui, tu devrais fermer le bureau. On va se tenir à carreau.

translation.en: And can you send me a list
translation.fr: Et envoie-moi la liste de toutes nos propriétés vides invendues

translation.en: of all the empty, unsold properties on our books as soon as you can?
translation.fr: Et envoie-moi la liste de toutes nos propriétés vides invendues dès que possible.

translation.en: Okay.
Thanks. Goodbye.
It's gonna be okay.
Jennifer, how are you feeling?
Good.
Heard about Dr. Amos.
translation.fr: J'ai appris pour le Dr Amos.

translation.en: Is Alexi your son?
What? No. That idiot.
But you are connected to the Russian mafia?
translation.fr: Mais vous êtes liée à la mafia russe ?

translation.en: He'll kill you next.
I mean, that is unless you get me out of here now.
translation.fr: Sauf si vous me faites sortir tout de suite.

translation.en: Then he might let you live.
Jennifer, listen to me carefully.
I don't lose. I won't lose.
translation.fr: Je ne perds jamais. Je ne perdrai pas.

translation.en: I'm never letting you go.
I own you.
And I will drain you of your money, your comfort, and your self- respect.
translation.fr: Et je vous prendrai votre argent, votre confort et votre amour-propre.

translation.en: Not because I want to, not because I'll enjoy it or because I plan for it,
translation.fr: Pas parce que je le veux, que ça me plaira, ou que je l'avais prévu,

translation.en: but because your people didn't play by the rules.
translation.fr: mais parce que vos amis n'ont pas joué le jeu.

translation.en: You wanna beat me?
Well, come at me fair and square. You get me in a courtroom. You outplay me.
translation.fr: Faites-le à la loyale. Affrontez-moi au tribunal et gagnez.

translation.en: You don't bring guns into a care home. You don't murder one of my friends.
translation.fr: Sans amener d'armes dans un EHPAD. Sans tuer une de mes amies.

translation.en: This is your life now, Jennifer.
You are just another old lady in a care home
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes qu'une vieille dame en EHPAD

translation.en: with dementia, with incontinence, with arthritis.
translation.fr: atteinte de démence, d'incontinence et d'arthrose.

translation.en: With no one…
except me.
or whoever the hell you really are,
you're gonna die in here,
alone and in terrible pain.
translation.fr: seule et dans une grande souffrance.

translation.en: Hey! Let her go! Let her go!
Come on. Come on.
- There you go. Let her go. Nice and easy. - Don't! She's the one!
translation.fr: - Voilà. Lâchez-la. Gentiment. - Non ! C'est elle !

translation.en: She's the one!
Good Lord.
Marla, are you-- are you okay?
Did she hurt you?
Only superficially.
I got lucky, but what about next time?
translation.fr: J'ai eu de la chance cette fois.

translation.en: As you can see, her mental health has severely deteriorated.
translation.fr: Vous le voyez, sa santé mentale s'est gravement détériorée.

translation.en: As this doctor's note describes,
Ms. Peterson has become delusional, paranoid,
translation.fr: Mme Peterson est devenue délirante, paranoïaque

translation.en: and violent.
She's a danger to others and herself.
translation.fr: Elle est un danger pour elle et autrui.

translation.en: And her doctor and I recommend
that she be moved immediately to a secure psychiatric facility
translation.fr: son transfert immédiat dans un institut psychiatrique sécurisé

translation.en: where-- where her needs will be more adequately taken care of.
translation.fr: où elle recevra des soins plus adaptés.

translation.en: I agree.
Don't worry.
This belonged to one of your wards?
translation.fr: C'était à un de tes protégés ?

translation.en: I just need an approximate valuation, Vee.
translation.fr: Il me faut juste une estimation.

translation.en: It's a real nice stone. Not the usual dog shit people bring in.
translation.fr: C'est une très belle pierre. Pas les merdes habituelles.

translation.en: What are we talking? Retail?
Hmm, 175, maybe 200 grand.
translation.fr: Il y en a pour 150, peut-être 200 000.

translation.en: - It's a nice one. - You mind holding on to it for a while?
translation.fr: - Il est beau. - Tu me le gardes un moment ?

translation.en: Keep it in your safe.
- Is it trouble? - Oh no.
No. I just have some errands to run. I don't want it in my purse all day.
translation.fr: J'ai des courses à faire. Je ne veux pas l'avoir dans mon sac.

translation.en: Thanks.
Fran says hello.
Oh. She told me to ask after your brother Mikey.
translation.fr: Elle espère que ton frère va bien.

translation.en: Mikey?
Yeah, he still in the trade?
Why? You need a fence for this?
In the future, maybe.
Michael still moves stuff here and there.
Good to know.
Hey, hey, hey. How'd it go? Did she take the bait on Mikey?
translation.fr: Alors ? Elle a mordu à l'appât pour Mikey ?

translation.en: Oh yeah. He may be a solution.
translation.fr: Oui. Ce sera peut-être une solution.

translation.en: Good.
Hey, did you pack our passports?
Passports.
Fuck.
Shit, baby. No, I didn't. Didn't you?
translation.fr: Merde, non. Tu ne les as pas ?

translation.en: Fuck. No.
I'm close to the house. I can go pick them up if you want me to.
translation.fr: Je suis tout près. Je peux les récupérer.

translation.en: Well, I think we should have them just in case.
translation.fr: On devrait les prendre au cas où.

translation.en: - But be careful. - Okay.
- See you back at the place? - Yeah. Okay.
translation.fr: - On se voit à la planque ? - Oui.

translation.en: What happened?
Oh my God. Are you okay?
- I don't know. I think somebody-- - Oh my God!
translation.fr: - Je crois que quelqu'un… - Bon sang !

translation.en: Get off me!
Hello, Marla Grayson.
I don't like you.
You only just met me.
You know,
you remind me of someone I knew when I was younger.
translation.fr: vous me rappelez quelqu'un que j'ai connu.

translation.en: She was fiery like you.
Amusing, confident.
Uncooperative.
I cut all her fingers off with a bread knife.
translation.fr: Je lui ai coupé les doigts avec un couteau à pain.

translation.en: She's buried underneath a Jimmy John's now.
translation.fr: Elle est enterrée sous un fast-food.

translation.en: Don't underestimate me.
Who are you?
A dangerous man.
It says that on your business card?
- You should be scared right now. - Why?
Are you gonna make another big fucking speech?
translation.fr: Vous allez faire un autre beau discours ?

translation.en: Ow. Jesus fucking Christ.
You stole something from me.
Something more than an old lady.
You know what I'm talking about.
translation.fr: Vous savez de quoi je parle.

translation.en: Right now, I have men searching for what you stole. They are tearing apart your office, your home,
translation.fr: Mes hommes les cherchent. Ils retournent votre bureau, votre maison,

translation.en: and if they do not find what they're looking for,
translation.fr: et s'ils ne trouvent pas ce qu'ils cherchent,

translation.en: I will tear you apart until you tell me where they are.
translation.fr: je vous torturerai jusqu'à ce que vous me disiez où ils sont.

translation.en: You recognize that woman, Marla?
That's your mother, isn't it?
After I destroy you, I will destroy her.
translation.fr: Après vous avoir éliminée, je l'éliminerai.

translation.en: Go ahead. I don't give a shit about that fucking sociopath.
translation.fr: Allez-y. Je me fous de cette sociopathe.

translation.en: I don't like being angry.
I much prefer to be calm.
But you have compromised the life I spent years carefully building.
translation.fr: Mais vous avez compromis la vie que j'ai mis des années à bâtir.

translation.en: Do you know who I am?
No, but I think I can guess.
You're either Nicholas Ignatyev or Roman Lunyov,
translation.fr: Vous êtes Nicholas Ignatyev ou Roman Lunyov.

translation.en: and my bet is that you're Roman because you seem more like a boss than a soldier.
translation.fr: Je dirais Roman, vous tenez plus du boss que du soldat.

translation.en: So you faked your own death,
translation.fr: Vous vous êtes fait passer pour mort,

translation.en: and then were afraid your Cleveland friends
translation.fr: et pour qu'on ne vous débusque pas

translation.en: would use your mother to flush you out, so you turned her into Jennifer Peterson.
translation.fr: via votre mère, vous l'avez transformée en Jennifer Peterson.

translation.en: I'm going to kill you now.
You're not afraid of death? Do you remember how scary it was in 1807?
translation.fr: - Vous n'avez pas peur ? - Vous aviez peur en 1807 ?

translation.en: No, me neither, because I wasn't alive yet.
translation.fr: Moi non plus, je n'étais pas encore en vie.

translation.en: It'll feel the same way when I'm dead.
Not even nothing. Why be scared of that?
Anyway, you don't need to kill me.
translation.fr: Vous n'avez pas à me tuer.

translation.en: When you sent that lawyer with a case full of money,
translation.fr: En envoyant un avocat me graisser la patte,

translation.en: your instinct was right. I'm entirely willing to be bought off.
translation.fr: vous aviez raison. Vous pouvez m'acheter.

translation.en: Your man just came in too low.
- Do you have a figure in mind? - Yeah.
I want ten million dollars.
translation.fr: Je veux dix millions de dollars.

translation.en: Of-- of-- of course you do.
You are…
you are brave, Ms. Grayson.
Stupid, but-- but brave.
Well, to make it in this country, you need to be brave.
translation.fr: Pour réussir, il faut être courageux.

translation.en: And stupid, and ruthless, and focused,
because playing fair, being scared, that gets you nowhere.
translation.fr: car jouer à la loyale, avoir peur, ça ne mène nulle part.

translation.en: That gets you beat.
You know that.
And I wanna be rich, Mr. Lunyov.
translation.fr: Je veux être riche, M. Lunyov.

translation.en: I wanna be very
fucking rich.
And my bet is that ten million dollars, that's not such a big deal for you.
translation.fr: Et je parie que dix millions de dollars, ce n'est rien pour vous.

translation.en: But for me, that's a start.
That's enough to be able to use money as a weapon.
translation.fr: Ça suffit pour utiliser l'argent comme arme.

translation.en: Like a bludgeon, the way real rich people do.
translation.fr: Comme matraque, comme font les vrais riches.

translation.en: That's what I want.
You hold no cards. I have your mother, and I have your diamonds.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes acculée. - J'ai votre mère et les diamants.

translation.en: And I've made sure that if I die, you'll never see those diamonds.
translation.fr: Si je meurs, vous ne reverrez pas les diamants,

translation.en: And it'll be so
complicated to extricate your mother from her situation
translation.fr: compliqué pour sortir votre mère de son pétrin

translation.en: that it'll take years
before she sees freedom.
If she even lives that long.
Just pay me off.
It's the easiest way.
Get rid of her.
Make sure it looks organic.
You have a payphone?
I'll give you fifty dollars if you let me make a call on your cell.
translation.fr: Je vous file 50 $ pour appeler de votre portable.

translation.en: Hey, it's Fran. Leave a message.
Can you call me a cab?
Oh, Fran!
Oh, baby. No!
Oh my God.
Fran?
I thought we were dead.
We're alive, hon.
- I'm scared. - I'm so fucking sorry.
I'm so sorry.
It's okay. It's okay.
How are you feeling?
Feeling better.
What's that, Marla?
It's the license plate of the car our Russian friend was driving.
translation.fr: C'est la plaque de la voiture de notre ami russe.

translation.en: Fran, say the word, and we're gone.
translation.fr: Un mot, et on se volatilise.

translation.en: We start again somewhere new.
Just us.
And do what?
We lost everything.
Not quite everything.
We can take them and run.
Or you can make a call and get me the address that that license is registered to.
translation.fr: Ou tu appelles pour avoir l'adresse qui correspond à la plaque.

translation.en: If we run, we'll always be looking over our shoulders.
translation.fr: Si on fuit, on sera toujours sur nos gardes.

translation.en: We'll always be waiting for him to find us.
Isn't it better to finish this now?
translation.fr: Ne vaut-il pas mieux en finir ?

translation.en: You have a plan.
I do.
Will it work?
I don't know.
Give me the phone.
Okay, here we are. This is the address for plate F8T444.
translation.fr: On y est. C'est l'adresse pour la plaque F8T444.

translation.en: That-- That one?
- Yeah. - He can't live here.
Maybe the plate was stolen?
No, the plate definitely matched a black Yukon.
translation.fr: Non, c'est bien celle d'un Yukon noir.

translation.en: Well, go around the back. I wanna get a closer look.
translation.fr: Fais le tour. Je veux voir de plus près.

translation.en: It's not him. It's his driver.
Go. He's on the move.
There, follow him!
He's pulling up.
Sir, your car's downstairs.
Be careful.
Hi. Uh…
I have an appointment with Mr. Naylor at Galen and Hersch.
translation.fr: J'ai rendez-vous avec M. Naylor, de chez Galen et Hersch.

translation.en: It's on the third floor, I think?
I'm actually a little early.
translation.fr: Je suis un peu en avance.

translation.en: Uh, is there a restroom I could use while I'm waiting?
Uh, sure. It's right around this corner and to your left.
Thanks.
Hi, can you help me?
I think I'm on totally the wrong level, and I can't find the exit. Is this B1? Or?
translation.fr: Je me suis trompée de niveau et je ne trouve pas la sortie. C'est B1 ?

translation.en: This is level two. The exit's that way, around the corner.
translation.fr: C'est B2. La sortie est là-bas.

translation.en: - Can't I use that elevator right there? - That's a private ele--
Where is Jackson?
Hello again.
Sir? Hey!
Is he in there?
Lying in a pool of his own urine.
You wanna go get rid of him?
Lead the way.
How much do you think he weighs? A hundred pounds?
One ten, yeah.
Sleep tight, motherfucker.
There you are.
How are you feeling?
Don't try to talk. You have a tube in your throat.
translation.fr: N'essayez pas de parler. Vous avez un tube dans la gorge.

translation.en: See that?
You're a John Doe.
You nearly died of an overdose. You're lucky they found you in time.
translation.fr: Vous avez failli mourir d'une overdose. On vous a trouvé à temps.

translation.en: You wanna hear an interesting fact?
When an incapacitated John Doe is found,
translation.fr: Quand on trouve un inconnu invalide,

translation.en: the state automatically appoints them a legal guardian
translation.fr: l'État lui assigne un tuteur légal

translation.en: to oversee their treatment and welfare.
translation.fr: pour s'assurer qu'il soit bien soigné.

translation.en: You know where this is going, right?
translation.fr: Vous voyez où je veux en venir ?

translation.en: I'm now your legal guardian.
I got you, John Doe.
I can do whatever I want with you.
translation.fr: Je peux faire ce que je veux de vous.

translation.en: Now let's find a nurse to get that tube out of your throat
translation.fr: Appelons une infirmière pour vous enlever ce tube,

translation.en: so you can arrange for ten million dollars to be moved into my account.
translation.fr: et vous allez virer dix millions de dollars sur mon compte.

translation.en: How's the throat?
Still painful.
I know you don't like losing,
translation.fr: Je sais que vous n'aimez pas perdre,

translation.en: but as your guardian, I suggest you swallow your pride and pay me off.
translation.fr: mais en tant que tutrice, je vous suggère d'avaler votre fierté et de me payer.

translation.en: You can have your mother,
your diamonds,
your freedom.
You'll never see me again.
Even if I pay you off,
are you not afraid I'll still kill you?
translation.fr: vous n'avez pas peur que je vous tue ?

translation.en: I'm not afraid, no.
I can make it happen easily.
I know.
But I could just as easily kill you if this thing continues any longer.
translation.fr: Mais je pourrais vous tuer aussi si ça continue.

translation.en: - Okay? - Let's end this now.
I'll give you the ten million dollars.
translation.fr: Je veux bien vous donner vos dix millions.

translation.en: I can arrange that.
However--
However?
I'd like to propose an alternative.
Instead of me giving you ten million dollars…
translation.fr: Au lieu de vous donner dix millions de dollars,

translation.en: we become partners.
Go into business together.
- Are you fucking with me? - No, I'm serious.
translation.fr: - Vous vous foutez de moi ? - Non, je suis sérieux.

translation.en: I mean…
I hate you,
but, ugh,
the money we could make…
You're a rare person, Marla.
translation.fr: Vous êtes quelqu'un de rare, Marla.

translation.en: Your determination is, uh,
frankly, it's scary, but this guardianship grift is ripe.
translation.fr: Franchement, ça fait peur, mais votre arnaque de tutelle est au point.

translation.en: But right now, it's small potatoes.
I propose we create a monster.
translation.fr: Je propose de créer un monstre.

translation.en: A countrywide guardianship corporation
with you as CEO and co- owner.
translation.fr: dont vous seriez PDG et copropriétaire.

translation.en: Use my money, use your…
translation.fr: On utilise mon argent, on utilise…

translation.en: skills.
Destroy the competition.
Take control of the entire market.
translation.fr: On prend le contrôle de tout le marché.

translation.en: - You wanna start a company with me? - Not just one company.
translation.fr: - Vous voulez qu'on monte une société ? - Pas qu'une.

translation.en: A corporation with 80 different companies all registered offshore,
translation.fr: Un consortium de 80 sociétés, toutes offshore,

translation.en: charging each other invoices, burying profit.
translation.fr: se facturant entre elles pour cacher les bénéfices.

translation.en: A real estate arm, a legal arm, a training arm,
a medical arm, a pharmaceutical arm.
- Our own chain of care homes. - Exactly.
With thousands of guardians working for us,
translation.fr: Avec des milliers de tuteurs œuvrant pour nous

translation.en: with hundreds of thousands of wards in our care.
translation.fr: et des centaines de milliers de personnes sous notre tutelle.

translation.en: That way, you win…
but I win too.
And we make each other billions of dollars
translation.fr: Et on se fait gagner des milliards de dollars

translation.en: legally…
mostly.
What about the diamonds?
Fuck the diamonds.
Split them 50- 50.
How do we trust each other?
If we make each other rich,
the trust will follow.
So are you in?
Every fortune ever accumulated started with a leap of faith.
translation.fr: Toute fortune part d'un acte de foi.

translation.en: But before you take that leap,
first take a long, hard look at yourself.
translation.fr: commencez par un long moment d'introspection.

translation.en: Know who you are.
Ask yourself.
Am I an insider
or am I an outsider?
Am I a lamb?
Or am I a lion?
Am I a predator?
Or am I prey?
translation.fr: ÉCOLE DE FORMATION DES TUTEURS Ou une proie ?

translation.en: Am I good at money?
Or am I good at people?
What am I willing to sacrifice
to achieve my dreams?
Marla Grayson, CEO and founder--
What lines will I not cross?
Don't try to be anyone else.
Just know who you are and use that to your advantage.
translation.fr: Sachez qui vous êtes et tirez-en profit.

translation.en: So, who are you?
Me?
I'm just someone who cares.
So are you a lion or a lamb?
translation.fr: Êtes-vous un lion ou un agneau ?

translation.en: I'm a lioness.
And I will do whatever I need to do
translation.fr: Et je ferai tout ce qu'il faut

translation.en: to protect the people I care about.
translation.fr: pour protéger ceux auxquels je tiens.

translation.en: You've had amazing success in such a short period of time.
Marla, what's your secret?
There is no secret, Peter.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de secret.

translation.en: All it takes is hard work
and the courage and determination to never give up.
translation.fr: et avoir le courage et la détermination de ne pas abandonner.

translation.en: So now you are a rich woman.
translation.fr: Vous êtes désormais une femme riche.

translation.en: How much are you worth? How much do you have in the bank?
translation.fr: Combien valez-vous ? Combien avez-vous sur votre compte ?

translation.en: You were great!
Ugh. My cheeks are aching from forcing that smile for so long.
translation.fr: J'ai mal aux joues tant je me suis forcée à sourire.

translation.en: I haven't counted recently.
But you are firmly in the top slice of the 1%.
translation.fr: Mais vous êtes assurément parmi les plus riches.

translation.en: What should we do now?
- Whatever the fuck we want! - Hey, bitch!
And you're still only 39. That must feel good.
Hey, bitch.
- Oh. Listen, I don't have time-- - Marla!
translation.fr: - Je n'ai pas le temps… - Marla !

translation.en: - No! Security! - Oh my God!
My mom died!
Help! We need help!
You never let me see her, and she died in there alone, you fucking bitch.
translation.fr: Tu ne m'as pas laissé la voir, elle est morte seule, salope !

translation.en: - We need help! - Take the weapon!
Fucking bitch!
Someone call help!
M-- Marla, baby, you're gonna be fine.
No, look at me, baby. Look at me. Look at me.
Listen to me. You're gonna be fine. You're gonna be-- Marla.
Help!  Help!
Marla!
No, Marla!
Help!
So with all the success…
Help!
…are you still ambitious?
Are there dreams you still want to achieve?
Peter, I am only just getting started.
translation.fr: Peter, je ne fais que commencer.

translation.en: Marla Grayson, CEO and founder
of Grayson Guardianships, thank you.
Thanks. It's been fun.
translation.fr: Merci. J'ai passé un bon moment.
